alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central McDuffie, northern Columbia, southeastern Lincoln and south central McCormick Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Appling, or 11 miles northeast of Thomson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverwood, Mistletoe State Park, Appling, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Riverside Park, Leah, Winfield, Blanchard Woods Park, Phinizy, Columbia County Jail, Wildwood Park, Carpenter Airport, Woodbridge, German Island, Pollards Corner, Eubank-Blanchard Community Center, Lake Springs Recreation Area, Bussey Point Campground, Clarks Hill, and Modoc. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 179 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
